REUTERS.UNKNOWN: C T f1447 reute b f BC-LIBYA-REPORTEDLY-BOUG 03-26 0043

TEXT.TITLE: LIBYA REPORTEDLY BOUGHT WHITE SUGAR
TEXT.BODY: Libya is reported to have recently bought two cargoes of white sugar from operators at around 229/230 dlrs a tonne cost and freight, traders said. The shipment period required was not specified. Reuter
